receivedRecipes.title: Received recipes
receivedRecipes.question: What is this?
receivedRecipes.answer: Someone sent you a recipe. If you decline a recipe the user that sent it will not be able to further send any more to you.

reviewIngredients.title: Review ingredients
reviewIngredients.question: Why should I review the ingredients?
reviewIngredients.answer: Reviewing ingredients allows you to replace them with your own - if you already have equivalent ones. Using the ingredients that are already in your inventory provies many benefits. They may already be linked to tasks in To Do Assistant, or they may already have nutrition or price data. If you don't find any equivalent ingredients in your inventory don't worry, new ones will be created.

shareRequests.title: Share requests
shareRequests.question: What is this?
shareRequests.answer: Someone wants to share a recipe with you. Shared recipes are a way for multiple users to collaborate. If you decline a share request the user that made it will not be able to further share any more with you.

dietaryProfile.title: Dietary profile
dietaryProfile.question: What is this for?
dietaryProfile.answer: Using some basic facts about you, we are able to provide some general nutritional recommendations. These will show up in the Diet tab and you will even be capable of customizing them according to your personal needs. Don't worry about doing math though. Once your dietary profile is configured every recipe will show (in its Nutrition table) how much (percentage-wise) every nutrient is from your daily recommended intake.
